timeline.overview: This timeline tracks each step of the van build process, including tools, design, challenges, and progress. The goal is to document the entire journey for potential future use in a YouTube video or portfolio.

phase_1.name: Design
phase_1.summary: This phase is focused on planning and designing the van build by working with GPT to outline all key features.
tasks: Define core areas of the van (Sleeping, Cooking, Office, Smart Hub, etc.)
Discuss modular systems (e.g., Bluetti battery, portable power banks)
Set up Smart Hub control center for IoT devices and automation
challenges: None yet, as this is still the planning stage
